statements: SELECT * FROM DeforestationRates;
SELECT Location, Year FROM DeforestationRates WHERE Deforestation_Rate > 5;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationRates ORDER BY Year DESC;
SELECT Location, Deforestation_Rate FROM DeforestationRates WHERE Area_ID = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT Location FROM DeforestationRates;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationRates WHERE Location = 'Amazon' ORDER BY Year DESC;
SELECT Location, Year, Deforestation_Rate FROM DeforestationRates WHERE Year >= '2015-01-01' AND Year <= '2020-12-31' ORDER BY Deforestation_Rate DESC;
SELECT Area_ID, Location, Year FROM DeforestationRates WHERE Deforestation_Rate > 5.0 AND Year = '2018-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT Location FROM DeforestationRates ORDER BY Location ASC;
SELECT Location, Year, AVG(Deforestation_Rate) AS Avg_Rate FROM DeforestationRates GROUP BY Location, Year HAVING AVG(Deforestation_Rate) > 3.0 ORDER BY Avg_Rate DESC, Location ASC;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_data WHERE country = 'Brazil';
SELECT region, deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_data WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT country, region, year FROM deforestation_data WHERE deforestation_rate > 10 ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT AVG(deforestation_rate) AS avg_rate, MAX(year) AS latest_year FROM deforestation_data;
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM tree_species WHERE endangered = TRUE ORDER BY species_name;
SELECT country, region, deforestation_rate, year FROM deforestation_data WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY country ASC, region DESC;
SELECT country, region, deforestation_rate, year FROM deforestation_data WHERE deforestation_rate > 1.5 ORDER BY deforestation_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_data WHERE country = 'Brazil' AND year = 2019;
SELECT country, region, deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_data WHERE deforestation_rate BETWEEN 0.5 AND 2.0 ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT species_id, species_name, habitat FROM tree_species WHERE endangered = true AND habitat IN ('Tropical Rainforest', 'Mangrove') ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_rates
SELECT region, year FROM deforestation_rates ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT AVG(deforestation_rate) AS average_rate FROM deforestation_rates WHERE region = 'Amazon'
SELECT * FROM forest_owners WHERE location = 'Brazil'
SELECT measure_name, description FROM protection_measures
SELECT * FROM deforestation_rates WHERE region='Amazon' ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT owner_name, location FROM forest_owners WHERE location='Brazil' ORDER BY owner_name;
SELECT measure_name, description FROM protection_measures WHERE measure_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT region, year, deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_rates WHERE year=2021 ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT * FROM protection_measures WHERE LOWER(description) LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY measure_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_data;
SELECT location, deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT location, year FROM deforestation_data WHERE deforestation_rate > 5.0;
SELECT MAX(deforestation_rate) AS max_deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_data;
SELECT location, survey_date, forest_cover_area FROM forest_survey WHERE forest_cover_area < 1000;
SELECT location, deforestation_rate, year FROM deforestation_data WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY deforestation_rate DESC;
SELECT survey_id, location, survey_date, forest_cover_area FROM forest_survey WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' ORDER BY survey_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM conservation_projects WHERE budget > 100000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT cause_id, cause_description FROM deforestation_causes;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_data WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT * FROM Organization;
SELECT name, location FROM Organization ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT name, position FROM Employee WHERE organization_id = 2 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, activity_type FROM Volunteer WHERE organization_id = 3 AND activity_type = 'Environmental Cleanup';
SELECT * FROM Organization WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM Organization WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM Employee WHERE position LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT organization_id, name, contact_email FROM Organization ORDER BY name DESC;
